title: Chamomile Mixta Essential Oil
description: Chamomiles are some of the most well known essential oils. Chamomile Mixta is good for almost everything - skin care, perfumes, baths, and air freshener. Emotionally, it's perfect for relaxation & dispelling anger.
cleaned_text: Chamomile is one of the most known and used essential oils. This oil is good for almost everything - skin care, perfumes, baths, and air freshener. If you can't brew a cup of Chamomile tea, use a drop of the oil to make you feel relaxed. In Chinese medicine it represents yin energy and a wood element. Chamomile Mixta helps release emotions linked to the past, dispels anger. When used on the throat area, helps expression of true feelings. MoroccoHistory and Background In Chinese medicine, this oil supports yin energy, wood element. Physical Description Pale yellow to brownish-yellow color.Aromatic Description Fresh-herbaceous top note, sweet rich-balsamic undertone, aromatic, slightly bitter.Biological Makeup and Components Trans Steam distillation from flowers.Information for Aromatherapists Chamomile Mixta is a middle note. It blends well with Rose, Marjoram, Geranium, Lavender, Lavandin, Vtiver, Cedarwood, Cypress, Benzoin, Chamomiles. You may use up to 5% of this oil in a blend.
